mapper.insert: insert into t_driver_info_table ( province, province_no, city, city_no, county, county_no, driver_id, is_delete, create_name, create_time, version, store_id, driver_acct ) values ( #{province}, #{provinceCode}, #{city}, #{cityCode}, #{county}, #{countyCode}, #{driverCode}, 0, #{createBy}, now(), 0, #{storeId}, #{driverAcct} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_driver_info_table SET province = #{province}, province_no = #{provinceCode}, city = #{city}, city_no = #{cityCode}, county = #{county}, county_no = #{countyCode}, change_name = #{lastModifiedBy}, change_time = now(), version = version + 1, store_id = #{storeId} WHERE driver_id = #{driverCode} and is_delete=0 and version=#{version}

mapper.select:
SELECT a.driver_acct driverAcct, a.driver_id driverCode, b.user_name driverName, b.phone phone, b.id_card IdCard, a.version version, b.version version1 FROM t_driver_info_table a JOIN t_sys_user b ON a.driver_id = b.user_code WHERE a.is_delete =0
and b.user_name like concat('%', #{driverName}, '%')
and a.province_no like concat('%', #{provinceCode}, '%')
and a.city_no like concat('%', #{cityCode}, '%')
and a.county_no like concat('%', #{countyCode}, '%')
and a.driver_id like concat('%', #{driverCode}, '%')

SELECT a.driver_acct driverAcct, a.province province, a.city city, a.county county, a.store_id storeId, a.driver_id driverCode, b.user_name driverName, b.phone phone, b.id_card IdCard, a.version version, b.version version1 FROM t_driver_info_table a JOIN t_sys_user b ON a.driver_id = b.user_code WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND a.driver_id = #{driverId}
